title: OpenClaw 的人工智能助手正在构建自己的社交网络
content: 这款曾名为 Clawdbot 的病毒式个人 AI 助手再次换壳。在短暂更名为 Moltbot 后，它现在选择了 OpenClaw 作为新名称。
original_title: OpenClaw's AI assistants are now building their own social network
original_content: The viral personal AI assistant formerly known as Clawdbot has a new shell — again. After briefly rebranding as Moltbot, it has now picked OpenClaw as its new name.

title: OpenAI 的 Sora 应用程序在出色推出后陷入困境
content: 新数据显示，随着人们对这款 AI 视频社交网络的早期热情消退，该应用的下载量和消费支出都在下降。
original_title: OpenAI's Sora app is struggling after its stellar launch
original_content: New data suggests the app is seeing declines in both app downloads and consumer spending, as the early hype about the AI video social network wears off.

title: 介绍用于高级机器人控制的 NVIDIA Cosmos 策略
original_title: Introducing NVIDIA Cosmos Policy for Advanced Robot Control

title: 人工智能代理迅速崛起，eBay 禁止非法自动化购物
content: 类 AI 工具和聊天机器人在访问平台之前必须获得许可。
original_title: eBay bans illicit automated shopping amid rapid rise of AI agents
original_content: New policy requires "buy for me" AI tools and chatbots to obtain permission before accessing the platform.

title: Nvidia 首席执行官反驳有关其公司 1000 亿美元 OpenAI 投资已陷入停滞的报道

original_title: Nvidia CEO pushes back against report that his company's $100B OpenAI investment has stalled

title: 据报道，埃隆·马斯克旗下的 SpaceX、特斯拉和 xAI 正在洽谈合并事宜
content: 此次合并将把 Grok 聊天机器人、星链卫星和 SpaceX 火箭整合到一家公司旗下。
original_title: Elon Musk's SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI in talks to merge, according to reports
original_content: This merger would bring the Grok chatbot, Starlink satellites, and SpaceX rockets together under one corporation.

title: 据报道亚马逊正在洽谈向 OpenAI 投资 500 亿美元
content: 如果交易达成，这将意味着亚马逊在 AI 霸主竞赛中同时支持相互竞争的初创公司。
original_title: Amazon is reportedly in talks to invest $50B in OpenAI
original_content: If a deal materializes, it would mean Amazon is backing competing startups in the race for AI supremacy.

title: 尽管存在重大风险，用户仍涌向开源 Moltbot 以获得始终在线的人工智能
content: 通过 WhatsApp 聊天，但需要访问你的文件和账户。
original_title: Users flock to open source Moltbot for always-on AI, despite major risks
original_content: The open-source "Jarvis" chats via WhatsApp but requires access to your files and accounts.

title: 新闻中心
content: 首次在另一颗星球上进行的 AI 辅助驾驶。Claude 帮助 NASA 的毅力号火星车在火星上行驶了四百米。全球最佳的编程、智能体和计算机使用模型，在幻灯片和电子表格等日常任务上也有显著改进。Claude Opus 4.5 提供前沿性能。
original_content: The first AI-assisted drive on another planet. Claude helped NASA's Perseverance rover travel four hundred meters on Mars. The best model in the world for coding, agents, and computer use, with meaningful improvements to everyday tasks like slides and spreadsheets. Claude Opus 4.5 delivers frontier performance.

title: 新闻动态
